Text: Slight correction: you may need the K-Lite Codec Pack (Basic) to play FLAC files in Windows Media Player. It's a free download here: http://codecguide.com/download_kl.htm
TNX!!! you are a "gentleman and scholar"! Keep'em coming. Great set.

Tracks:

1. Anonymous - "In paradisum"
2. Hildegard of Bingen - "Columbia aspexit"
3. Bernart de Ventadorn - "La dousa votz"
4. Pérotin - "Alleluia. Diffusa et gratia"

6. Machaut - "Dame, de qui toute ma joie vient" (excerpt)

8-9. Josquin - Pange lingua Mass, Kyrie; from the Gloria
10. Josquin - "Mille regrets"
11. Palestrina - Pope Marcellus Mass, from the Gloria
12. Weelkes - "As Vesta Was from Latmos Hill Descending"
13. Anonymous - "Daphne"
14. Anonymous - "Kemp's Jig"
15. Gabrieli - "O magnum mysterium"
16. Monteverdi - The Coronation of Poppea, "Tornerai?"
17. Monteverdi - The Coronation of Poppea, "Speranza, tu mi vai"
18. Purcell - Dido and Aeneas, "Thy hand, Belinda"; "When I am laid"
19. Purcell - Dido and Aeneas, "With drooping wings"
20-23. Frescobaldi - Suite (Canzona, Balletto, Corrente, and Passacaglia) 
24-26. Vivaldi - Violin Concerto in G, Op. 4, No. 12
27. Qur'anic recitation - "Ya Sin"
28. Hawai'ian chant - mele pule
29. Navajo song - "K'adnikini'ya'"
30. Inca processional music - "Hanaq pachap kusikuynin"
31. Gambian minstrel song - "Laminba"
32. Pygmy polyphony - Elephant-hunt song
